articles.title: Scientists now have better understanding of how Ebola virus replicates within human cells - WION
articles.description:
Scientists in Canada and the United States have found a new way in which Ebola reproduces in the body. Ebola is a deadly virus affecting people mostly in sub-Saharan Africa. 

It is a viral haemorrhagic fever that was first identified in central Africa in 197…
